profile_positions.description:
As a Loss Prevention Advisor organize hazard identification (HAZID) studies as a method of identifying hazards to prevent and reduce any adverse impact that could cause injury to personnel, damage or loss of property, environment and production,  or to avoid liability. 
Ensure hazard identification is a component of a company's Risk Assessment, planned (project) Method Statements (RAMS) and management. Raise awareness that an HAZID determines unwanted process risks, causes or consequences and all possible mitigation measures will be brought forward.
On request internal or third party audits, surveys or inspections are executed  in order to establish if the mitigation measures are implemented properly and/or if the executed works are in compliance with legislation in force.
